revised_title: Polarization of Light by Reflection from the Surface of a Crystal of Iceland Spar
tldr: The author investigates the polarization of light by reflection from the surface of a crystal of Iceland spar, building upon previous work by Brewster, Seebeck, and Neumann. The study uses a goniometer and various adjustments to analyze the angles and azimuths of polarization when the crystal is in contact with different media.
